1: מִזְמ֗וֹר <sup>4210 </sup> <n>A Psalm</n> לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <sup>623 </sup> <n>of Asaph</n> אַ֤ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>Surely</n> ט֭וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[is] good</n> לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>to Israel</n> אֱלֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>Truly God</n> לְבָרֵ֥י <sup>1249 </sup> <n>[even] to such as are of a clean</n> לֵבָֽב׃ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>heart</n>
2: וַאֲנִ֗י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> כִּ֭מְעַט <sup>4592 </sup> <n>were almost</n> [נָטוּי כ] (נָטָ֣יוּ <sup>5186 </sup> <n>afternoon</n> ק) רַגְלָ֑י <sup>7272 </sup> <n>But as for me my feet</n> כְּ֝אַ֗יִן <sup>369 </sup> <n>had well nigh</n> [שֻׁפְּכָה כ] (שֻׁפְּכ֥וּ <sup>8210 </sup> <n>cast</n> ק) אֲשֻׁרָֽי׃ <sup>838 </sup> <n>my steps</n>
3: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> קִ֭נֵּאתִי <sup>7065 </sup> <n>For I was envious</n> בַּֽהוֹלְלִ֑ים <sup>1984 </sup> <n>at the foolish</n> שְׁל֖וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>the prosperity</n> רְשָׁעִ֣ים <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> אֶרְאֶֽה׃ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>[when] I saw</n>
4: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> אֵ֖ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> חַרְצֻבּ֥וֹת <sup>2784 </sup> <n>For [there are] no bands</n> לְמוֹתָ֗ם <sup>4194 </sup> <n>in their death</n> וּבָרִ֥יא <sup>1277 </sup> <n>[is] firm</n> אוּלָֽם׃ <sup>193 </sup> <n>but their strength</n>
5: בַּעֲמַ֣ל <sup>5999 </sup> <n>They [are] not in trouble</n> אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <sup>582 </sup> <n>[as other] men</n> אֵינֵ֑מוֹ <sup>369 </sup> <n>else</n> וְעִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>like</n> אָ֝דָ֗ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>[other] men</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יְנֻגָּֽעוּ׃ <sup>5060 </sup> <n>neither are they plagued</n>
6: לָ֭כֵן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> עֲנָקַ֣תְמוֹ <sup>6059 </sup> <n>compasseth them about as a chain</n> גַאֲוָ֑ה <sup>1346 </sup> <n>Therefore pride</n> יַעֲטָף־ <sup>5848 </sup> <n>covereth</n> שִׁ֝֗ית <sup>7897 </sup> <n>them [as] a garment</n> חָמָ֥ס <sup>2555 </sup> <n>violence</n> לָֽמוֹ׃
7: יָ֭צָא <sup>3318 </sup> <n>stand out</n> מֵחֵ֣לֶב <sup>2459 </sup> <n>with fatness</n> עֵינֵ֑מוֹ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>Their eyes</n> עָ֝בְר֗וּ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>they have more</n> מַשְׂכִּיּ֥וֹת <sup>4906 </sup> <n>could wish</n> לֵבָֽב׃ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>than heart</n>
8: יָמִ֤יקוּ ׀ <sup>4167 </sup> <n>They are corrupt</n> וִידַבְּר֣וּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and speak</n> בְרָ֣ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>wickedly</n> עֹ֑שֶׁק <sup>6233 </sup> <n>[concerning] oppression</n> מִמָּר֥וֹם <sup>4791 </sup> <n>loftily</n> יְדַבֵּֽרוּ׃ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>they speak</n>
9: שַׁתּ֣וּ <sup>8371 </sup> <n>They set</n> בַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>against the heavens</n> פִּיהֶ֑ם <sup>6310 </sup> <n>their mouth</n> וּ֝לְשׁוֹנָ֗ם <sup>3956 </sup> <n>and their tongue</n> תִּֽהֲלַ֥ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>walketh</n> בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>through the earth</n>
10: לָכֵ֤ן ׀ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> [יָשִׁיב כ] (יָשׁ֣וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>break</n> ק) עַמּ֣וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>Therefore his people</n> הֲלֹ֑ם <sup>1988 </sup> <n>hither</n> וּמֵ֥י <sup>4325 </sup> <n>and waters</n> מָ֝לֵ֗א <sup>4392 </sup> <n>of a full</n> יִמָּ֥צוּ <sup>4680 </sup> <n>[cup] are wrung out</n> לָֽמוֹ׃
11: וְֽאָמְר֗וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And they say</n> אֵיכָ֥ה <sup>349 </sup> <n>how</n> יָדַֽע־ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>know</n> אֵ֑ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>How doth God</n> וְיֵ֖שׁ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>? and is there</n> דֵּעָ֣ה <sup>1844 </sup> <n>knowledge</n> בְעֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <sup>5945 </sup> <n>the Most</n>
12: הִנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> אֵ֥לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> רְשָׁעִ֑ים <sup>7563 </sup> <n>Behold these [are] the ungodly</n> וְשַׁלְוֵ֥י <sup>7961 </sup> <n>who prosper</n> ע֝וֹלָ֗ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>in the world</n> הִשְׂגּוּ־ <sup>7685 </sup> <n>they increase</n> חָֽיִל׃ <sup>2428 </sup> <n>[in] riches</n>
13: אַךְ־ <sup>389 </sup> <n>Surely</n> רִ֭יק <sup>7385 </sup> <n>[in] vain</n> זִכִּ֣יתִי <sup>2135 </sup> <n>Verily I have cleansed</n> לְבָבִ֑י <sup>3824 </sup> <n>my heart</n> וָאֶרְחַ֖ץ <sup>7364 </sup> <n>and washed</n> בְּנִקָּי֣וֹן <sup>5356 </sup> <n>in innocency</n> כַּפָּֽי׃ <sup>3709 </sup> <n>my hands</n>
14: וָאֱהִ֣י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> נָ֭גוּעַ <sup>5060 </sup> <n>long have I been plagued</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַיּ֑וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>For all the day</n> וְ֝תוֹכַחְתִּ֗י <sup>8433 </sup> <n>and chastened</n> לַבְּקָרִֽים׃ <sup>1242 </sup> <n>every morning</n>
15: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> אָ֭מַרְתִּי <sup>559 </sup> <n>If I say</n> אֲסַפְּרָ֥ה <sup>5608 </sup> <n>I will speak</n> כְמ֑וֹ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>thus</n> הִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> ד֭וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>[against] the generation</n> בָּנֶ֣יךָ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of thy children</n> בָגָֽדְתִּי׃ <sup>898 </sup> <n>behold I should offend</n>
16: וָֽ֭אֲחַשְּׁבָה <sup>2803 </sup> <n>When I thought</n> לָדַ֣עַת <sup>3045 </sup> <n>to know</n> זֹ֑את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>it was</n> עָמָ֖ל <sup>5999 </sup> <n>this it [was] too painful</n> [הִיא כ] (ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> ק) בְעֵינָֽי׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>for me</n>
17: עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>Until</n> אָ֭בוֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>Until I went</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> מִקְדְּשֵׁי־ <sup>4720 </sup> <n>into the sanctuary</n> אֵ֑ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>of God</n> אָ֝בִ֗ינָה <sup>995 </sup> <n>[then] understood</n> לְאַחֲרִיתָֽם׃ <sup>319 </sup> <n>I their end</n>
18: אַ֣ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>Surely</n> בַּ֭חֲלָקוֹת <sup>2513 </sup> <n>them in slippery places</n> תָּשִׁ֣ית <sup>7896 </sup> <n>Surely thou didst set</n> לָ֑מוֹ הִ֝פַּלְתָּ֗ם <sup>5307 </sup> <n>thou castedst them down</n> לְמַשּׁוּאֽוֹת׃ <sup>4876 </sup> <n>into destruction</n>
19: אֵ֤יךְ <sup>349 </sup> <n>How</n> הָי֣וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לְשַׁמָּ֣ה <sup>8047 </sup> <n>How are they [brought] into desolation</n> כְרָ֑גַע <sup>7281 </sup> <n>as in a moment</n> סָ֥פוּ <sup>5486 </sup> <n>they are utterly</n> תַ֝֗מּוּ <sup>8552 </sup> <n>consumed</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>by</n> בַּלָּהֽוֹת׃ <sup>1091 </sup> <n>with terrors</n>
20: כַּחֲל֥וֹם <sup>2472 </sup> <n>As a dream</n> מֵהָקִ֑יץ <sup>6974 </sup> <n>when [one] awaketh</n> אֲ֝דֹנָי <sup>136 </sup> <n>[so] O Lord</n> בָּעִ֤יר ׀ <sup>5782 </sup> <n>when thou awakest</n> צַלְמָ֬ם <sup>6754 </sup> <n>their image</n> תִּבְזֶֽה׃ <sup>959 </sup> <n>thou shalt despise</n>
21: כִּ֭י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> יִתְחַמֵּ֣ץ <sup>2556 </sup> <n>was grieved</n> לְבָבִ֑י <sup>3824 </sup> <n>Thus my heart</n> וְ֝כִלְיוֹתַ֗י <sup>3629 </sup> <n>in my reins</n> אֶשְׁתּוֹנָֽן׃ <sup>8150 </sup> <n>and I was pricked</n>
22: וַאֲנִי־ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> בַ֭עַר <sup>1198 </sup> <n>So foolish</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>I</n> אֵדָ֑ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>[was] I and ignorant</n> בְּ֝הֵמ֗וֹת <sup>929 </sup> <n>I was [as] a beast</n> הָיִ֥יתִי <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> עִמָּֽךְ׃ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>before</n>
23: וַאֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> תָמִ֣יד <sup>8548 </sup> <n>Nevertheless I [am] continually</n> עִמָּ֑ךְ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>You</n> אָ֝חַ֗זְתָּ <sup>270 </sup> <n>with thee thou hast holden</n> בְּיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>hand</n> יְמִינִֽי׃ <sup>3225 </sup> <n>[me] by my right</n>
24: בַּעֲצָתְךָ֥ <sup>6098 </sup> <n>me with thy counsel</n> תַנְחֵ֑נִי <sup>5148 </sup> <n>Thou shalt guide</n> וְ֝אַחַ֗ר <sup>310 </sup> <n>and afterward</n> כָּב֥וֹד <sup>3519 </sup> <n>me [to] glory</n> תִּקָּחֵֽנִי׃ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>receive</n>
25: מִי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Whom</n> לִ֥י בַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>Whom have I in heaven</n> וְ֝עִמְּךָ֗ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>and besides</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nothing</n> חָפַ֥צְתִּי <sup>2654 </sup> <n>[that] I desire</n> בָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>[but thee]? and [there is] none upon earth</n>
26: כָּלָ֥ה <sup>3615 </sup> <n>faileth</n> שְׁאֵרִ֗י <sup>7607 </sup> <n>My flesh</n> וּלְבָ֫בִ֥י <sup>3824 </sup> <n>and my heart</n> צוּר־ <sup>6697 </sup> <n>[is] the strength</n> לְבָבִ֥י <sup>3824 </sup> <n>of my heart</n> וְחֶלְקִ֗י <sup>2506 </sup> <n>and my portion</n> אֱלֹהִ֥ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>[but] God</n> לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>for ever</n>
27: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> הִנֵּ֣ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> רְחֵקֶ֣יךָ <sup>7369 </sup> <n>For lo they that are far</n> יֹאבֵ֑דוּ <sup>6 </sup> <n>from thee shall perish</n> הִ֝צְמַ֗תָּה <sup>6789 </sup> <n>thou hast destroyed</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> זוֹנֶ֥ה <sup>2181 </sup> <n>all them that go a whoring</n> מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n>
28: וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <sup>589 </sup> <n>But</n> קִֽרֲבַ֥ת <sup>7132 </sup> <n>for me to draw near</n> אֱלֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>to God</n> לִ֫י־ ט֥וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[it is] good</n> שַׁתִּ֤י ׀ <sup>7896 </sup> <n>I have put</n> בַּאדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>in the Lord</n> יְהֹוִ֣ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> מַחְסִ֑י <sup>4268 </sup> <n>my trust</n> לְ֝סַפֵּ֗ר <sup>5608 </sup> <n>that I may declare</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> מַלְאֲכוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>4399 </sup> <n>all thy works</n>
